short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clear site data from current site url. Cookies, localstorage, indexeddb, etc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Deleted site specific settings with a button click

This will only delete information that is specific to the current url.

Will delete cookies from the current tabs origin but not from another origin

Can delete:
cacheStorage
cookies
fileSystems
indexedDB
localStorage
pluginData
serviceWorkers
webSQL
